    • Method Detail

      • toDouble

        public double toDouble()
        Description copied from class: Value
        Double representation. This allows us to have generic optimization criteria. The task is than to minimize total value of assigned variables of a solution. If the value may depend on other values of the assignment, use Value.toDouble(Assignment) instead.
        Overrides:
        toDouble in class Value<CSPVariable,CSPValue>
        Returns:
        this value's contribution to the solution value
